name: Advanced Cardiac Life Support Certification
description: This badge certifies successful completion of ACLS training, demonstrating expertise in managing cardiac arrest, peri-arrest conditions, and complex cardiovascular emergencies. The recipient has mastered advanced interventions including airway management, rhythm interpretation, pharmacological therapy, and team leadership during resuscitation.

criteria.narrative: Demonstrated proficiency in: 1) ECG rhythm recognition 2) Advanced airway management 3) Emergency pharmacology 4) Megacode scenarios 5) Team dynamics in resuscitation 6) Post-cardiac arrest care
